languages.text: {n}Сервитор снова переводит взгляд на вас, теперь уже не скрываясь. Лицо его странно подрагивает — будто мышцы, забывшие, что такое мимика, пытаются изобразить приветливость.{/n} "Мы — Номос. Мы использовали это вместилище, чтобы покидать корабль".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервитор снова переводит взгляд на вас, теперь уже не скрываясь. Лицо его странно подрагивает — будто мышцы, забывшие, что такое мимика, пытаются изобразить приветливость.{/n} "Мы — Номос. Магос Паскаль дал нам это вместилище, чтобы мы могли покидать корабль".

languages.text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."
languages.original_text: {n}Сервитор снова переводит взгляд на вас, теперь уже не скрываясь. Лицо его странно подрагивает — будто мышцы, забывшие, что такое мимика, пытаются изобразить приветливость.{/n} "Мы — Номос. Мы использовали это вместилище, чтобы покидать корабль".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching as if the muscles after having forgotten the meaning of the facial expression, are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

{n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching as if the muscles, after having forgotten the meaning of facial expression, are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

{n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching as if the muscles after having forgotten the meaning of the facial expression, are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

{n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching as if the muscles after having forgotten the meaning of the facial expression, are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

{n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

{n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

languages.text: {n}Le servitor vous regarde à nouveau, n'essayant plus d'éviter votre regard. Son visage est pris de spasmes, comme si ses muscles avaient oublié comment présenter des expressions faciales et s'efforçaient de prendre un air affable.{/n} « Nous nous appelons Nomos. Nous avons utilisé ce réceptacle pour quitter le vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor vous regarde à nouveau, n'essayant plus d'éviter votre regard. Son visage est pris de spasmes, comme si ses muscles s'efforçaient de prendre un air affable dont ils ont oublié la signification.{/n} « Nous nous appelons Nomos. Nous avons utilisé ce réceptacle pour quitter le vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}机仆再次看着你，不再试图躲避你的目光。它的脸在抽搐，仿佛面部肌肉已忘记了何为表情，此刻正在竭力使自己看起来亲切些。{/n}“我们是诺莫斯，我们借用这个容器离开了那艘船。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工再次看着你，不再试图躲避你的目光。它的脸在抽搐，仿佛面部肌肉已忘记了表情的含义，此刻正在竭力使自己看起来亲切些。{/n}“我们是诺莫斯，我们借用这个容器离开了那艘船。”

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor sieht dich wieder an, er kann deinem Blick nicht länger ausweichen. Sein Gesicht zuckt, als hätten die Muskeln zuvor vergessen, was der Gesichtsausdruck bedeutet, und würden nun versuchen, seine Züge freundlich aussehen zu lassen.{/n} "Wir sind Nomos. Wir haben dieses Behältnis genutzt, um das Schiff zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor sieht dich wieder an, er kann deinem Blick nicht länger ausweichen. Sein Gesicht zuckt, als hätten die Muskeln zuvor vergessen, was der Gesichtsausdruck bedeutet, und würden nun versuchen, seine Züge freundlich aussehen zu lassen.{/n} "Wir sind Nomos. Wir haben dieses Behältnis genutzt, um das Schiff zu verlassen."

languages.text: {n}El servidor vuelve a mirarte, sin evitar tu mirada esta vez. Su rostro se retuerce, como si los músculos, después de haber olvidado el significado de las expresiones faciales, estuvieran luchando por hacer que sus gestos parezcan amistosos.{/n} «Somos Nomos. Hemos usado este receptáculo para abandonar la nave».
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor vuelve a mirarte, sin evitar tu mirada esta vez. Su rostro se retuerce, como si los músculos, después de haber olvidado el significado de las expresiones facial, estuvieran luchando por hacer que sus gestos parezcan amistosos.{/n} «Somos Nomos. Hemos usado este receptáculo para abandonar la nave».

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターは再びこちらを見つめ、もはやこちらの視線を避けようともしない。顔の筋肉が表情を浮かべるという機能を忘れたかのように痙攣していて、愛想よく見せるのに必死になっているかのようだ。{/n}「我々はノモス。この器を利用して船を離れた」
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターは再びこちらを見つめ、もはやこちらの視線を避けようともしない。顔の筋肉が表情を浮かべるという機能を忘れたかのように痙攣していて、愛想よく見せるのに必死になっているかのようだ。{/n}「我々はノモス。この器を利用して船を離れた」

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör, artık gözlerinden kaçınmaya çalışmadan tekrar sana bakıyor. Sanki kasları, yüz ifadesi nedir bilmeyip sevimli olmaya çabalıyormuş gibi seğiriyor.{/n} "Biz Nomos'uz. Bu muhafazayı kullanarak gemiden ayrıldık."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks at you again, no longer trying to avoid your gaze. Its face is twitching, as if the muscles have forgotten what facial expressions are and are now struggling to make its features look amiable.{/n} "We are Nomos. We have made use of this receptacle to leave the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitör, artık gözlerinden kaçınmaya çalışmadan tekrar sana bakıyor. Sanki kasları, yüz ifadesinin ne olduğunu unutmuş da sevimli olmaya çabalıyor gibi seğiriyor.{/n} "Biz Nomos'uz. Gemiden ayrılmak için bu muhafazadan faydalandık."
